lead_paragraph: Warplanes struck Sana, killing civilians, after the collapse of talks between Houthi rebels and the Saudi-backed government.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa reported from Sana, and Rod Nordland from Cairo. Saeed Al-Batati contributed reporting from Al Mukalla, Yemen.
byline.original: By SHUAIB ALMOSAWA and ROD NORDLAND

headline.print_headline: Saudi-Led Coalition Steps Up Bombing in Yemen After Peace Talks Collapse
headline.main: Saudi-Led Coalition Resumes Bombing of Yemeni Capital After Talks Collapse

snippet: Warplanes struck Sana, killing civilians, after the collapse of talks between Houthi rebels and the Saudi-backed government....
abstract: Saudi-led military coalition intensifies bombing campaign in Yemen, striking capital of Sana and killing 21 people across country; strike follows collapse of peace talks between Houthi militias and government of Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi.
